overview: At Casa Base, a volunteer structure of Diavati, a group of refugees learns the art of photography with photographer Mattia Bidoli as a teacher. Together, they plan their photoshoots, talk about what it's like to live in the camp, but also about the evolution and new horizons that open up before them through photography.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: A photography group of refugees living in the Diavata camp in Thessaloniki take pictures and tell their stories.
title: Our Photos, Our Voices
